Of course you have, Chiaki. Your game knowledge never disappoints.
You just look like a bunny to me...
...Bless you? Did you sneeze?
Burlesque? Like... exotic dancing?
That's awful! You shouldn't just say that to someone, Joey.
I-I don't know! Don't look at me like that.
I didn't even notice a difference at first.
I don't understand this terminology at all.
Never really thought about using an armband before... might help with my photography.
It's obvious to everyone else too, huh?
That's really neat, Jolyne!
Of course, considering you don't have much else...
It's obvious to everyone else too, huh?
(Are they... flirting?)
C'mon, Jolyne. Everyone has these types of rounds.
It's obvious to everyone else too, huh?
Sorry guys, I just can't enjoy this game while she's here.
Sorry everyone, it's just hard to have fun with Junko around...
Oh! Is this... what do they call it? A split personality?
So what's the deal with that eyepiece anyway? Does it help you see stuff better?
Bats? Are your clothes just made out of bats?
W-Why are you calling me out for this?
Well? How is it?
I don't really agree with that logic, but it's probably a good idea.
You'll have to play with Ibuki sometime!
I can understand sandals at the beach, but at a strip poker game?
It's a pretty circlet. Like something the Ultimate Princess would wear!
So aggressive over two little gloves.
Uh, sure. Why don't you wear socks? Wouldn't that be better for your... line of work?
Is there a point to having holsters so high up? I mean, wouldn't that put more strain on your shoulders?
I am, I am!
Finally. Last thing this place needed was a sadistic gunwoman.
Oh my God! Quick, someone get some water!
Again? Where is all this coming from?
Your "comm tower" looks suspiciously like a bunny-ear ribbon.
Nice and modest. I like that, Sola.
Chelsea School... can't say I've heard of it. But I'm sure it's great.
That... won't really help her.
It's not cool to pick favorites, Dealer. Look at the difference between them.
Oh, you can see them too? I thought I was going crazy for a minute there.
A lot of us are newcomers. No need to be nervous!
Shoes, Sola? Alright.
Is this not normal for Zizou?
You brought a knife? You weren't planning on using it at all, were you?
What are you doing? You're not gonna attack us or anything, are you?
I-I can still take your picture! I just have to... wipe something off of my hand...
One second! I'll take your picture after I... get something off of my hand...
Sounds interesting. And somehow you two ended up here?
Ahhhh! Are you trying to kill us?
You don't seem the type, no...
Clever thinking, Buffy. And you got it off pretty quickly, too!
Looks like it's time for the panty shot...
I'm ready when you are, Chiaki.
It really is the worst, isn't it?
I kind of understand how you feel. I wouldn't want my best friends to find out about the game. And Sato...
What!? You're taking off your shirt!?
Your skirt, huh?
Let me know if you need help with that. I'm an expert at this point.
Okay, ready!
You're not...
I suppose I can enjoy that she's losing...
I guess I can find some joy from her losing...
R-Right off the bat?
You two know each other? This is going to be an awkward night...
What the!?
H-Hey! Are you okay, Ladybug?
(Wish I thought of that. My shirt's not that long...)
In that case, you should've worn them! You'd impress us more.
W-What's it doing?
It's a pity you're losing it, Nayru. It complimented you so well!
Those shorts barely function as shorts anyway. Open fly, no legs to speak of...
Well, don't be nervous! Going shirtless isn't all that bad, you know?
Hey now...
These "blows" aren't really anything special. Just a decent hand...
So you're back now. You were pretty out of it for a second.
So many explosions... this is starting to get annoying now.
What about your hat? Actually, it may just pull your hat off with it!
Very unfortunate...
I don't doubt you! My classmates have weird hair, too. Pink, white...
Doesn't that violate some divine law? It should.
Geez! I get it!
Alright already, I get it!
I suppose that's a little bit better.
Perfect! You made a pretty cute O-face, ~name~!
Perfect! You made a pretty sexy O-face, ~name~!
Chiaki's gonna be so excited to see this! She's a big fan of yours, Tifa.
It was a little hard to get you in frame, but I still think it came out pretty good.
Are you... okay? Should I go find Mikan?
Wow, you 're really focused in this picture, Aiyana. You're even playing with your breasts and everything! Are you a pro at this?
Oh, that's a good face! I could actually see your eyes cross!
I never knew snakes could do it like this! Gundham will really excited to see this!
I wonder what your fans will think once they see you're real now, Alpha?
Geez... between the belly bulge, the look on your face, and the vine itself, this picture looks like it came straight out of a dirty magazine!
Sometimes simple pictures are among the best. I'm a big fan of this picture, Ami!
That was certainly... detailed. You certianly have a way with words, Angie.
Ooh, that was a good one. I'll send you a copy later if you want, Ann.
Gotta say Annie, for someone so serious, you have the cutest O-face.
Not to pry, but is this something you do with your usual cameraman?
You look so... mystical in this shot, Arwen!
Ooh, good photo! If you're okay with it, want me to send a copy to this "Kirito" of yours?
You didn't look like you were having a lot of fun, Athena. I feel bad for taking your pic now.
Something tells me you didn't like having your picture taken, Ayano.
I'm glad I got that look of pure release on film. Want to see, Beatrix?
I hope you didn't break my lens, B.C I need to keep a record of tonight!
The picture's a little blurry, but it still came out good. Do you agree, BlackRose?
Don't worry, Blake. I'll keep this picture confidential. No one has to know about your ears.
Oh... did you finish? I missed it... mind if I get it now?
Just let me know when you're about to... oh, you're already done? Drat, missed it!
Oh... Your eyes were closed. Still! It was a good picture, Chiaki!
You're gonna love this photo, Chiaki. I'd show it to the rest of the class, but... you know.
I'm taking photos of animatronics in ecstasy...how did my life come to this?
Ooh, action shot! I even got multiple angles of it!
Good one, Ciri! You can practically feel the bliss in this photo!
Well, can't deny that the look you gave just now looked genuine enough. I even have it on film.
G-Geez, this isn't the place for that... Get a room!
Lovely face, Corrin! I hope it came out just as good here...
I know you usually take selfies, but I hope you don't mind a full body shot every now and then.
Not very graceful for a princess, but the picture's good quality, at least.
Okay, so maybe you don't have the prettiest O-face, Daria. But I hope you like the picture I took, at least.
This picture came out really well! Maybe you should look into having a card of it made?
I'll be sure to send you these pictures, Elaine. You probably want to keep them private, right?
I feel bad for taking a picture of you when you were tricked into coming here, but I had to do it!
This is amazing! Portals with phantom hands? Quality stuff, Elizabeth!
You should smile more, Faye. You have such a cute O-face! Here, I'll give you a copy of the photo as a reminder.
You really did do a good shave job, Felicia. You can see for yourself, if you want.
I'll send you the photo later, Florina- Think of it as a memento of your newfound courage!
That was a... very intense face, Futaba. I'll give you the picture later.
You know Gogo, I wasn't really expecting much, but this pic came out surprisingly wholesome!
Chiaki told me before I got here to get pictures of Spider-Woman. So mission accomplished!
I'm not quite sure faces are supposed to get that red...
Huh? The hands don't show up at all...
Aw, looks like Hinata here had a good time after all. Want me to send you a copy of the picture later?
Ooh, I managed to get the shot while your eyes were crossed! This'll make a great memento.
Didn't think I'd get to photograph one of my classmates' O-faces today, but I'm glad I did!
I expected to photograph someone a lot less important than you, Princess Jasmine. I'll keep these photos private, unless you say otherwise.
I didn't think you were the type to drop F-bombs, Jenetta. Yet I managed to get a photo of just that!
I'll give you the photos later, Joey. I'm sure you could use it as feedback for your acts.
I still don't understand how you could keep so still, but the shot was great, at least!
Sorry, I just... didn't want to take a picture this time.
I'm glad to have caught such a lovely face on film, Jura.
Y-You squirted all over my camera! At least the shot came out okay.
If she arrested you, she'd basically be telling the world she played you in strip poker, so I think you're fine... for now.
Someone wanted me to give these photos of you to her, but... I think I shouldn't.
Uh... I can't really see your irises in this picture, Korra... are you okay?
Maybe I'll give a copy to Gundham. I'm sure he'll be happy to know that dark creatures like you really do exist...
I didn't think I'd be getting such a risque pic of my underclassman today...
R-Right... I'll give you a copy of the pic later, Kyu. I'm sure it could be useful on your "love fairy transcript" or something.
Well, at least you didn't do that stupid smug half-smile again.
Your transformation was a little too fast for me, Launch. Looks like I only managed to get the purple-haired you on film.
You have a wonderful smile, Lyn! Even when you're cumming!
Yeah, okay, I'll take a shot of myself... that's not weird at all...
Well, if nothing else, this photo can be used as a diagram on safety.
Hmm. You don't appear when I aim my camera, so it was a bit tough to get you centered for the shot...
You look so cute when you're finishing, Marinette! I'll give you the picture, if you want.
You've got a lot of stamina, Meg. Unsurprising, I guess. Anyway, say "cheese"!
Really cute, Mei! Here, I'll get another one with your glasses on, okay?
Geez... even when you're cumming, you barely emote at all.
Do you mind if I show this to my friend Mikan, Mercy? I want to show her she's not the only medical student who gets into these situations.
Still can't believe you'd take advantage of your little sister like this...
Looks like the alcohol really got to you, huh...
Give me a nice big smile, Misty! It feels good, right?
Not again! For some reason, my camera keeps glitching when I try to photograph Monika...
...I took the picture, but I think it's best that I keep this one far away from her.
I really didn't think I'd be taking a family photo of you, Morrigan.
That was a lovely poem, Nagisa. Maybe you can tell me another one sometime?
That expression has all the subtleties of a great O-face. I love it, Natsuki!
Glad this camera has such a powerful zoom. I could barely see your face as is!
Hey, could you maybe tell her to... come back? I want to get a picture of... Veran.
It's almost a reward in a way. At least, you thought so, judging y your expression in this picture.
Good thing a picture's worth a thousand words...
I'll send you a copy of the photo I took, Nugi-chan. Maybe if it's good enough, it can be your new website header!
Didn't think I'd be capturing a four-armed girl pleasuring herself on film tonight. It somehow came out not disgusting.
Guess this is proof that gods do this sort of thing too! It's kind of incredible, when you think about it.
Very nice, Ms. Pauling. By the way, some guy named Jeremy asked me to send the photo to him. Says he knows you? Don't think it's a good idea.
I like the slight smile you have photo here, Paya. It says a lot about you.
I had no idea the mouth could get that big...
Taking pictures of pearls isn't exactly my area of expertise, but I hope the picture came out well.
A genuine photo of a demon-human hybrid! Do you mind if I show this to my friend? He loves this kind of stuff.
Geez... you're such a crass woman. But at least I got a genuine picture from you.
(As annoying as she is, this was sort of a fun time, playing with her. Although I hope I only see her through pictures from now on...)
Say, since you don't really seem to know what a picture is, how about I give you this one? I took it when you finished just now.
Wow, can't believe I caught such a big squirt on camera! That's definitely one for the scrapbooks.
You're so elegant, Rosalina. Even when you finish.
Huh? Did someone say something? I thought I heard someone ask me to post this image to a... "Wee Board" or something.
Bit more than what you were expecting, Ruby?
You seem like you're used to this, Ryuko. Got a pretty good picture out of it.
Great photo! Hey, maybe you can take my photo later! Would you like that, Saki?
You've really gotten into this, haven't you Samus? You look so different than how you were when we started!
What a great dramatic shot! But, uh... where'd that wind come from?
It's nice to get a photo of you like this. Maybe not as enthusiastic, but it feels a lot more real to me.
I didn't think I'd be shooting something as kinky as a bondage scene today...
Covering your mouth, huh? That's okay. I got a good shot of the rest of you!
You look like you enjoyed yourself, Seven. Want me to give you the pic later? You can show it to your shipmates!
That was really nice, Shantae! Hey, maybe I can come shoot for you some time! What do you say?
Hmm... you look kind of bored in the photo, Shego. Were you not having fun?
You're not the only one who can take photos here, Shego. How's it feel?
...Well, not every photo has to turn out perfect.
Where did...? Whatever, I'm sure Kazuichi would love it... both of you, for that matter. He loves his machines, after all.
It fell out right when I got the pic... I hope you don't mind too much, Sola.
Huh? But I still need a picture... I'll delete this one, though.
What a great finishing face! The agape mouth, the unfocused eyes, the blush showing through the war paint! So good!
Huh? Spooky, you're not showing up on film...
Say Streaming-chan, do you think full-frontal shots of tonight are in high-demand? I bet your fans would love this pic of you!
Interested in this picture, Chiaki? I know you're a fan of Tifa.
Looks like I managed to catch the hat throw! This came out really well, if I do say so myself.
That was pretty fast! I almost couldn't catch it on camera!
You know, this isn't what I usually photograph when somone wants horse photos...
Huh. I think I caught the exact moment Uhura blew a gasket...
Sorry. The pic didn't come out very heroic-looking. Hope you're fine with that.
What an intense photo, Velma! Curling up like that? So good!
Oh... you, uh, got my camera all wet, Videl.
Wait, hold on a minute! What's with all that blue stuff? I've got to get all of this on film!
Don't hate me for this, Weiss, but I have to get photos of everyone here. Even you.
Great posture and technique! I'll give you the photo later, I think you'll like how it turned out!
Covering your eyes, Willow? What are you, a child?
Good one, Yang! There was a real fire in your eyes... almost literally, even.
You have such a cute face, Zelda. As befitting of royalty.
Ah, what pretty butterflies! It's like a camera filter!
I loved how breathy you look in here, Zoey! Want a copy? You know, as a memento of tonight.
That face seemed a bit exaggerated, and her eyes look a bit yellow here, but... I got the pic.
Relax, ~name~, I've already done something far more embarrassing,so you can handle this!
Guess you should be thankful you're here with us and not getting shot at, huh Pit?
It's kind of fifty-fifty with Zizou here.
No one has to know. I won't tell them.
Just take as much time as needed. We understand.
I hope they don't expect us to eat each other out like her...
So does this place just not have a roof or...
Palutena'd probably be mad if you knicked one of her subordinates, huh? Hope you aimed that well...
I'm more surprised that's stayed on so long!
Well, I'm not gonna let that stop me from getting this picture!
Maybe you should've brought a lucky penny, too.
Hey! You can't do that!
Is she... really shaving herself?
Hey, do you need help, Florina?
Well, it doesn't matter. I'll be taking a picture either way.
I'll have to commemorate it, then!
They have to come at some point, so let's get it over with.
No more luck or tricks, Joey. Just you and your top.
You can't really play tough now that you've already screwed up this badly... I almost feel sorry for you.
It's obvious to everyone else too, huh?
Yeah, I'm not really feeling this...
I'm not really into this...
It's not like they were practically spilling out already...
This looks like a one-sided crush, Juri...
Did... did you just make your top fade away? Like it was nothing?
Are you really this desparate to be photographed? Fine, I guess...
Did she just casually chuck those bats away? Good thing Gundham's not here...
...I think you're prattling.
Don't worry. You'll be in good company soon enough!
Is that fire? That's way too extreme!
Are you going to be okay there? (Maybe I should close my camera this round.)
I can't wait to get unobscured shots of that tattoo!
Talking big doesn't mean much. You still lost those hands...
You really shouldn't say stuff like that to the losers... even if they like it!
Well, if you're going to be gracious about it for once, by all means.
Right. Go ahead, Sayla.
Yeah, looking pretty unavoidable. Sorry, Sayori.
(You're acting like that was super protective in the first place.)
I know this is tough, but I'll be cheering you on!
I hope you can consider us all friends...
(She's freaking out... I hope you can calm her down, Zizou...)
Can someone set the record straight with her? At this rate she'll be down to just her accessories in no time!
Hold on a second, Valerie. I just have to zoom out in order to fit those on my camera.
You're doing a good job so far, ~name~. Just keep doing that.
You're doing a good job so far, ~name~, so keep it up.
I really didn't think I'd be shooting a porno today...
G-geez, ~player~, you're really going at it...
I'm not impressed.
Alright! You just focus on winning, okay!?
You try and win this! I'm rooting for you!
That was a pretty small target to hit. Maybe you're the Ultimate Sharpshooter?
Stop it! You'll scare her!
Those shots seem a little too perfect, yeah...
Steel bullets are pushing it!
Why aren't you stopping her? Someone could seriously get hurt!
Are you slipping, Aimee? Maybe it's time to stop.
Hey, she's not wrong. I have evidence to prove it, even.
It is? Would you mind if I got a few pictures of it, then?
Did you do that just so I could get a better picture?
It's a bit embarrassing to say, but lots of people really enjoy thigh shots.
Uh, the point of this to keep your clothes as long as possible.
Are you fine now? I'm glad.
The payoff's gonna be good, I can feel it!
Aren't rabbits naturally warmer with regards to this stuff? I don't really know animal biology very well.
I should really start carrying thread myself...
I don't feel like taking pictures right now.
I really don't feel like taking any photos of her.
You didn't put her up to this, did you, ~player~?
(Will this really be a pleasure? Chun-Li looks distressed about it.)
Say, if you ever want them looked at, I'm sure Mikan would be more than happy to help.
It's not so bad, right?
When did you ever imply that?
Yep! Makes for great photos!
Seems "cardigan" won out in the end anyway.
Great! It might be too late to leave now, anyway...
Getting down to the wire now!
You can put it on again! ...After the game.
Now you're just making this more confusing...
Haha. Bit close for comfort there, right Sayori?
Like, you really think a pair of stockings is part of you?
Those panties are adorable! Where'd you get them?
They're really well made! You could be an Ultimate with that type of talent!
Everyone, be nice to her!
You still have some dignity. It's just... not much.
Just to be clear, these photos won't leave this room. Does that make you feel better?
I didn't believe it either until I was actually doing this...
Be nice, everyone! It's tough for her to be doing this!
Warpaint? Guess you're really getting into it now, Sonya.
One second. I can take a picture, but I have to clean my hands first. I don't want to get my camera sticky.
You better not let me down like ~player~ did, ~name~!
I just want to make sure you're comfortable. (And to see if I can really do something this bold...) Come over after you're naked, of course.
This is the first time you two will have seen each other naked, right? How about a picture to celebrate?
This is the first time you two will have seen each other naked, right? And the first time you've seen Palutena...finish? How about a picture to celebrate?
I know I was upset that accessories were still being removed, but I didn't expect you to go all out!
I'm done...
After the game's over, come meet me by the entrance. I'll let you pick out any pictures you want to keep of yourself.
This stays strictly between us, okay? It'd be a disaster if this got out to my friends.
...What are you looking at? Don't you have a game to finish?
...Can someone pass me a rag or something? My camera got a little wet.
Hey, will one of you check out my photo reel? These types of pics aren't my specialty, so I'd like to hear an outsider's opinion of them.
(Do I really have to sit here... like this? It feels like all eyes are on me.)
Could I have won if I took off my camera too? Maybe. Doesn't matter now, anyway.
I'm excited to see how the game ends. I'll be sure to take an extra-special photo of the winner!
I may be done, but I can still take plenty of pics! I'm ready!
I normally don't take pictures of myself, let alone things like this...
Did you enjoy the photoshoot?
This was sort of fun. Say, how about a group picture? C'mon, join us, ~name~!
I guess you really are the Ultimate Gamer, Chiaki.
Good game, Ibuki!
I really didn't want to lose to her...
snap! Yep, this one's going in my cringe compilation...
Damn it... This wasn't fair! I was outnumbered!
I uh... wouldn't mind playing again... If you wanted to...
This was sort of fun. Say, how about a group picture? Feel free to strip down and join in, ~name~!
This was sort of fun. Say, how about a group picture? We're all naked anyway, so feel free to join in, ~name~!

text.content: Hey, ~name~!
You made it!
I was getting worried since it took two weeks to get a hold of you, but, well, here you are.
Oh, that's right! I wanted to show you something!
How about you have a seat? This'll just take a minute.
Huh? No? Uh, sure. Your choice, I guess.
Tada! A scrapbook!
I've actually been tracking down everyone who goes to the Inventory and visiting them!
I've got plenty of pictures here. Want to see?
I'm sure you recognize most of these ladies, right?
The Inventory's very popular with the students of Beacon Academy, apparently.
Here's a fun one! The students of UA Academy!
Even compared to Ultimates, they're really something else.
Oh? Yeah, I only took photos with the girls.
I wasn't really that interested in finding the men again for... obvious reasons.
Anyway...
These girls were all so sweet!
They run the cutest little Literature Club... huh?
Odd. I could've sworn I set my camera up to be centered for this shot.
Sorry. I swear I don't make mistakes like this often!
Ah, this one! Sinnoh! They were all super cool!
Especially the one in black here...
I got separate photos of their little creatures, too.
But that's for another day.
Oh, uh, this is just a pic of me and my class.
You remember Chiaki, right?
I love them all so much...
But, uh, don't tell them I said that. Especially not the boys!
Ah, and here's a pic I got with the ladies of Hoshido and Nohr!
They get along surprisingly well for two nations who used to wage war on each other.
I like them. They'd get along well with my class, I think. You see that maid on the left? She has so much in common with Mikan!
I think you get the idea.
So here's the thing.
I wanted to come to your world, but I couldn't find anything on it!
You're a total ghost!
So I was thinking...
Since I can't find anything from your world...
If you wanted to... make some good memories right here...
I'd be willing.
You and Mahiru undress. At Mahiru's request, you put on a condom as well.
Ah... I'm enjoying this, ~name~. Are you?
I'm not super experienced, but you... can go faster if you want...
Ah! You're... not too shabby.
So! Keep going... Please...
It feels so good!
D-Dammit! I'm so close now! Don't stop, ~name~!
AHHHHH!
The hell was that?
Did you seriously finish before me?
I telegraphed I was getting close and everything!
Geez...
Still, it was a fun time.
You're better than I gave you credit for. Sorry 'bout that.
Wait, hold on. I was so caught up in the moment, I forgot to get a picture, didn't I?
Whoops.
I know it's blasphemous for the Ultimate Photographer to be saying this...
But I hope you'll carry today with you always, photo or not.
'Kay?
